creditline: Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his Father

texts.textentryhtml:
Moses Michelangelo Guggeneheim (1837-1914), Venice; Purchased by Jean Paul Richter (1847-1937) from "Guggenheim Collection Sale," Palazzo Balbi, in Venice, Italy, September 30, 1913 (Lot 826B, as Cavazzola, for frs 5,170 with 826A) for Henry White Cannon (1850-1934); by descent to his son, Henry (Harry) W. Cannon, Jr. (1887-1966), Class of 1910; Donated to the Museum in 1935.

[Date of sale erroneously given in Richter 1936 as October 6, 1913]
